Hammed - Your 2nd most powerful opponent (POSSIBLE SPOILER)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Battles: Hammed - Your 2nd most powerful opponent (POSSIBLE SPOILER)
By RNA on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 01:58 am:

Next to Akirel, Hammed(Hare/Zuum) is the next most powerful computer opponent in the game. Holly will randomly choose it to battle you in the Class S Ima-Fimba tourney. (Hammed is green in color)

Stats: LIF-777, POW-723, INT-991, SKI-740, SPD-782, DEF-801, TOT-4814.

-- RNA (RNA@Ribosome.nuc), December 08, 1999
